title: Where can I generate a fake tracking number? - Quora

response.answer_text: Just pull a number out of your rectum. As long as it has the right number of digits and starts with the right prefix, it should appear convincing enough. The more important question is why do you want to generate a fake tracking number? If you are involved in any kind of commerce, and you provide someone with a fake tracking number, you would very likely be guilty of fraud.
You certainly can generate one. You’d have to be very clever for it to be formatted correctly, and be unique enough to be accepted and tracked.
response.upvotes: Answer requested by Efexlogistics Courier Service, William Chang and 1 more
